title: A systematic review on green synthesis of silver nanoparticles using plants extract and their bio-medical applications
content:
Publication date: 15 June 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 11

Author(s): Mst. Sanjida Akhter, Md. Ataur Rahman, Rezaul Karim Ripon, Mahfuza Mubarak, Mahmuda Akter, Shamim Mahbub, Firoj Al Mamun, Md. Tajuddin Sikder
